borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions:
<div><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; font-size: 14px;">The proposed first floor rear extension, by reason of its
scale and siting, would represent an&nbsp;over-development of the site
that&nbsp;would harm the character and appearance of the host property, built
form of the terrace and established character</span><span style="font-size: 14px; line-height: 107%; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">&nbsp;the area, notably given the location of the
application site within the Becontree Estate. As such, the proposed development
is contrary to:</span></p><ul><li><span style="font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 10.5pt;">National Planning Policy
Framework&nbsp;National Planning Policy Framework (NPPF) (DLUHC 2021),</span></li><li>Policy D1, D4, and HC1 of the London
Plan (March 2021),</li><li>Policies CP2 and CP3 of the&nbsp;Local
Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010),</li><li>Policies BP2, BP8 and BP11 of
the&nbsp;Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan
Document (DPD) (March 2011),</li><li>the Residential Extensions and
Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012), and</li><li>Policies SP2, DMD1, DMD4 and DMD6
of&nbsp;The London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan:
(Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021).</li></ul></div>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:0cm;line-height:normal"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">The scale and siting of the proposed first floor
rear extension would result in an increased sense of overbearingness,
overshadowing and a harmful loss of outlook and daylight to neighbouring
occupiers, therefore constituting unneighbourly development and contrary to:<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:0cm;line-height:normal"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span></p>











<ul><li style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">National Planning Policy Framework&nbsp;National
Planning Policy Framework (NPPF) (DLUHC, 2021)<o:p></o:p></span></li><li style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">Policies D4 and D6 of the London Plan (March 2021);<o:p></o:p></span></li><li style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">Policy CP3 of&nbsp;Local Development Framework
(LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010)<o:p></o:p></span></li><li style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">Policies BP8 and BP11 of the&nbsp;Local Development
Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011)<o:p></o:p></span></li><li style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">The Residential Extensions and Alterations
Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012);<o:p></o:p></span></li><li style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">Policies DMD1 and DMD6 of&nbsp;The London Borough
of Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission Version,
December 2021)<o:p></o:p></span></li></ul>
description: Demolish existing front porch and  part ground floor rear extension; Construction of single storey front and rear extension and part first floor rear extension.

constraints_details.result: 567 Becontree Avenue, Dagenham, Barking And Dagenham, RM8 3JR
